Numericycle Demo

Basic Example

				  		
import numericycle from "@degjs/numericycle";

const element = document.querySelector('.example__number');
const instance = numericycle(element);

instance.cycle({
	initialValue: 5,
	finalValue: 250
});
5

Custom Duration and Easing Example

				  		
import numericycle from "@degjs/numericycle";

const element = document.querySelector('.example__number');
const instance = numericycle(element);

instance.cycle({
	initialValue: 999,
	finalValue: 100,
	duration: 4000,
	easing: 'easeIn'
});
999

Custom Number Format Example

				  		
import numericycle from "@degjs/numericycle";

const element = document.querySelector('.example__number');
const instance = numericycle(element);

instance.cycle({
	initialValue: 5000,
	finalValue: 3500,
	format: '0'
});
5000

Clock Example

				  		
import numericycle from "@degjs/numericycle";

const element = document.querySelector('.example__number');
const instance = numericycle(element);

instance.cycle({
	initialValue: 0,
	finalValue: 59,
	duration: 60000,
	easing: 'linear'
});
0
